Query.name: Insert_Borrow
Query.QuerySQL: INSERT INTO t_Borrow([Cost],[StudentID],[UserName],[BookID],[BookName],[BorrowTime],[ReturnTime],[Renew],[BorrowStatus],[ISBN]) SELECT @Cost,@StudentID,[UserName]=(select [UserName] FROM t_User where StudentID=@StudentID),[BookID]=(select [BookID] from t_Book where ISBN=@ISBN), [BookName]=(select [BookName] from t_Book where ISBN=@ISBN),@BorrowTime,@ReturnTime,@Renew,@BorrowStatus,@ISBN

Query.name: Select_Student_Borrow_Count
Query.QuerySQL: select COUNT(StudentID) from t_Borrow where StudentID=@StudentID and BorrowStatus='0'

Query.name: Select_StudentBorrow
Query.QuerySQL: select * from t_Borrow where StudentID=@StudentID and BorrowStatus='0'

Query.name: Update_Borrow_Return
Query.QuerySQL: update t_Borrow set BorrowStatus=@BorrowStatus where BorrowID=@BorrowID

Query.name: Update_Borrow_Cost
Query.QuerySQL: update t_Borrow set Cost=@Cost where BorrowID=@BorrowID

Query.name: Select_Book_BorrowStatus_Count
Query.QuerySQL: SELECT COUNT(BookID) FROM t_Borrow WHERE BookID=@BookID AND BorrowStatus='0'
